entry.title: Capture Youth Glow Booster Illuminating Serum by Christian Dior for Women - 1 oz Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Beauty
Price: 92.95

This illuminating serum is a glow booster to helps to restore radiance. Murunga Plum, known to be 100 times more concentrated in Vitamin C than oranges, combined with alpha hydroxy acid helps to brighten the complexion and smooth skin texture.

entry.title: Miss Dior for Women by Dior Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 125.95 - 157.95 (3 variants)

Miss Dior Cherie symbolizes modern youth and feminine charm at its best. The perfume features fruity top notes that exude freshness and vibrancy. Its heart is an interesting blend of caramel popcorn and sweet-smelling flowers for a unique scent. The base musky notes add warmth and lusciousness to an otherwise light and sparking perfume. Long-lasting and ideal for everyday wear.

entry.title: Dior Addict For Women By Christian Dior Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 154.95

Addict is a rich and sensual fragrance, formulated for the bold confident woman. It has a dynamic energy and gets you ready to party without any inhibitions. It is ideal for wearing in the evening or night out.

entry.title: Pure Poison Eau de Parfum Spray for Women by Dior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 80.95 - 154.95 (2 variants)

The Pure Poison fragrance was released by the Dior fashion house in 2004. The fragrance was formulated by Olivier Polge, Dominique Ropion and Carlos Benaim.

entry.title: Sauvage for Men by Christian Dior Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 89.95 - 169.95 (6 variants)

Sauvage Dior for men gets its name from Eau Sauvage (1966), even though these two fragrances are not part of a single collection. fragrance reminds you of men from wild desert region wearing khakis and hats, exuding pride and confidence.

entry.title: Poison Girl Eau de Parfum Spray for Women by Dior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 68.95 - 154.95 (3 variants)

The Dior Poison Collection has always been greatly loved by dedicated users through the years, and the new addition Posion Girl is no exception. It is described as a bitter-sweet floral, and its main accords are balsamic, bitter orange and vanilla. The perfect fragrance for the modern woman who dares to follow her dreams, Posion Girl is deliciously addictive. It is concocted by famous perfumer, Francois Demachy who says it is a ""recognizable fragrance"" and an ""uncompromising signature""

entry.title: Dior Homme Intense Eau de Parfum Spray for Men by Dior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray
Price: 82.99 - 119.95 (2 variants)

Stylish, urbane and intrepid, the Dior Homme Intense represents the spirit of the strong yet sensitive modern man. Launched by Dior back in 2011, the Dior Homme Intense features an exciting combination of airy floral and musky scents with warm woodsy notes at its heart. The luscious fragrance was created by Francois Demachy and is marketed in a luxurious gold tinted glass atomizer.

entry.title: Dior Homme Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Dior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 91.95 - 115.95 (2 variants)

Created by the world class perfumer Francois Demachy, the Dior Homme offers an extraordinary combination of airy florals and warm musky scents that render it a pure olefactory delight! The fragrance opens with brilliant sage and lavender that gradually give way to mouth watering cacao and amber and finally linger on as a leathery musky fragrance with vetiver at its heart.

entry.title: DIOR HOMME BY CHRISTIAN DIOR FOR MEN - COLOGNE SPRAY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Cologne
Price: 105.95

Launched by the design house of Christian Dior in the year 2007. This woody floral fragrance has a blend of lavender, neroli, sage, cardamom, bergamot, mandarin orange, cacao, amber, leather, patchouli, and vetiver notes.

entry.title: Dioressence by Christian Dior for Women - Eau de Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau De Toilette Spray
Price: 134.95

Launched by the design house of Christian Dior in the year 1979. This oriental spicy fragrance has a blend of patchouli, oak moss, vetiver, benzoin, vanilla, musk, styrax, jasmine, carnation, cinnamon, tuberose, and orris notes.

One Essential Intense Skin Detoxifying Booster Serum by Christian Dior is a transformative skincare solution.

entry.title: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet for Women by Christian Dior Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 100.95 - 144.95 (3 variants)

Christian DiorÃªs horticultural knowledge is the stuff of legends, and his sensitive understanding of floral blends contributed to many an outstanding feminine fragrance. Miss Dior is yet another elegant fresh fruity-floral fragrance from the iconic fashion house. The sweet and light bouquet of peony, Sicilian Mandarin, rose and musk greet you. The notes are clean, delicate and elegant, making Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet ideal for everyday wear. Good silage ensures that you keep smelling sweet like a bouquet of fresh flowers all day long!

entry.title: Dior One Essential Eye Serum by Christian Dior for Women - 0.5 oz Eye Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Beauty
Price: 68.00

It eliminates toxins identified at the heart of the skin and intensely revitalizes it. The eye contour is revitalized, smoothed, and re-energized. It is sulfates free.

entry.title: Eau Sauvage Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Dior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 115.95 - 139.95 (2 variants)

This splendid citrus scented fragrance was introduced by the house of Dior in the year 1996. The nose behind the perfume is Edmond Roudnitska. The lemony freshness imparted by the perfume makes it a perfect spring-summer all day wear perfume. The citrus tone to the perfume is rendered by the lemon, bergamot, fruity notes, and the bitter undertones are given by caraway, rosemary, and basil. The aromatic and fresh spicy heart is composed of various flowers, coriander and orris root among others while the woody fragrance is imparted by musk, vetiver, oakmoss, and amber.

entry.title: DIORISSIMO BY CHRISTIAN DIOR FOR WOMEN - Eau De Toilette SPRAY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 85.00 - 108.95 (2 variants)

Launched by the design house of Christian Dior in the year 1956. This floral fragrance has a blend of jasmine, lily of the valley, ylang-ylang, amaryllis, and boronia notes. It is recommended for daytime wear.

entry.title: Diorella by Christian Dior for Women - Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 130.95

Launched by the design house of Christian Dior in the year 1970. This floral fragrance has a blend of lemon, peach, bergamot, melon, honeysuckle, jasmine, violet, rosebud, oak moss, vanilla, clove, sandalwood, vetiver, musk, and patchouli notes.

entry.title: Dune For Women By Christian Dior Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 81.95 - 125.95 (2 variants)

Dune from Christian Dior is a joyous ode to the past, reminiscent of the childhood memories from the designer's home in Granville. First created in 1991 by Jean-Louis Sieuzac and Nejla Barbir, Dune has won several accolades. Its woody herbiness combines with a deep floral heart to give a unique fragrance that is warm, familiar, elegant yet enigmatic.

entry.title: Hypnotic Poison For Women By Christian Dior Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 69.95 - 125.95 (3 variants)

CHRISTIAN DIOR created HYPNOTIC POISON in 1998. It is the result of the following top fragrance Notes: almond, caraway and jasmine. The middle notes are: moss, sandalwood and oakmoss and the base of the fragrance is: vanilla, musk and cedar. HYPNOTIC POISON is recommended for romantic use.

Launched by the design house of Christian Dior in the year 1966. This floral fragrance has a blend of lemon, basil, bergamot, cumin, lavender, jasmine, rose, carnation, iris root, coriander, patchouli, sandalwood, oak moss, musk, and amber notes.

Launched by the design house of Christian Dior. This floral fruity fragrance has a blend of sea salt, neroli, tuberose, ylang ylang, jasmine, and peach.

entry.title: Dolce Vita Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Dior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 81.95 - 125.95 (2 variants)

Christian Dior Dolce Vita is a woman's fragrance, created by perfumer Pierre Bourdon for Dior. Embrace the sweet life with this oriental fragrance that has whispers of woody base notes. The warm spiciness from notes of cinnamon and vanilla add a hint of sensuality to this carefree fragrance.

entry.title: Miss Dior for Women by Dior Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Christian Dior
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 92.99 - 125.95 (3 variants)

Miss Dior Cherie by Christian Dior is a sweet and fruity scent that is a contemporary spin on the classic. Wild strawberry leaves, violets, patchouli and a caramel popcorn heart make this a fragrance with a unique flair. Launched in 2005, this creation by Christine Nagel was quite distinct from the original Miss Dior from 1947. Francois Demachy then gave us a more modern, sophisticated update on the fragrance in 2011.
